author: Kyle Barr
title: We Might Finally Get an OLED Apple iPad Next Year
description: This past year was a weird time for Apple. The company revealed two new MacBook Pros within ten months. It showed off the massive gamble that is its $3,500 Vision Pro headset. Its latest Apple Watches were a very bare refresh. Plus, the company didn’t reveal …
